The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 August is 57,652 (6,672.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 July, there were 2,136 new confirmed cases (247.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 July, there were 3,566 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 40% (1,430 fewer cases).
